titles.title: A bill to redesignate the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial in the State of Missouri as the "Gateway Arch National Park".
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 115-417.
Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Mr. Gosar moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 1438.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Mr. Gosar objected to the vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed. The point of no quorum was considered as withdrawn.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The expanded summary of the Senate passed version is repeated here.)
Gateway Arch National Park Designation Act
(Sec. 2) This bill designates the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial in Missouri as the "Gateway Arch National Park."
